author: Scott McCartney
title: Is This the Start of Better Airport Shopping in the U.S.?
text:
GRAPEVINE, Texas—Here’s a little secret about airport shopping: You don’t have to hold an international ticket anymore to buy at many duty-free shops. And another: It actually can be a pretty good deal.
In the age of online shopping, retailers are finding that airports can take some of the sting out of declining mall traffic. Travelers have time to kill and money to spend when they’re captive inside airport security. Major airports around the world, from Singapore to Dubai, London to Beijing, have essentially become shopping...
